text: I was not only pleasantly surprised by the taste of the product, but also the quality and the personal touch of the owners of Nature‚Äôs Harvest Á¥†Âè∂. They are prompt in replying my text messages when I have forgotten where I bought the vegan buns. It's amazing how their earthly approach swiftly converted me to explore their Sengkang stalls instead of my initial rigidness to only travel to central locations. This is one typical success story of how humility and sincerity in managing a business reap good harvest naturally. Coincidentally, its brand name speaks for itself! Well done!!!
I ordered from their website and was pleasantly surprised to find such a wide selection of vegetarian and even vegan food options. Thanks for fast delivery. Will buy from lady boss again üëç
Amazing place for vegetarian options. It‚Äôs a must go for me when I‚Äôm on vegetarian. The lady there is very friendly and very helpful and gives very good recommendations too! üëç
The stall offers great variety of vegan products. It's convenient as a one-stop venue for vegetarian items.
Anyone know their actual operation hours? Online stated 830pm on Monday, but it was closed when I was there at 730pm. Very disappointed as I travelled all the way there.
